title: Amy Didn’t Want Her Daughter To Dress Up As ‘School Girl’ for Halloween + 'Most American Things' Draft + Bobby Answers Therapy Homework Questions
itunes:title: Amy Didn’t Want Her Daughter To Dress Up As ‘School Girl’ for Halloween + 'Most American Things' Draft + Bobby Answers Therapy Homework Questions
description:
Amy’s daughter wanted to be a school girl for Halloween, but the both of them immediately thought no because she immediately thought about "sexy school girl". We draft the 'Most American Things'. Bobby’s therapist gave him some homework to take home. He had to answer a series of questions with the answers: Always, Often, or Rarely.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
